channel.title: 🏢 Champalimaud Research on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Champalimaud Research on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: eXponential FAmily Dynamical Systems (XFADS): Large-scale nonlinear Gaussian state-space modeling
item.description: XFADS: a novel low-rank structured VAE framework for large-scale nonlinear Gaussian state-space modeling, achieving high predictive accuracy and scalability.
